name: Super Sonic Turtle Racer
description:
Racing/Roguelike game for the Mix and Game Jam (Theme : Mixing Genre)

First time I try to make a racing game. All graphic assets and soundFx were done by me, only the music is from FreeMusicArchive.

There is still few bugs but it should work pretty well. I should have take more time on the project itself than doing little turtles particles.

Thanks for Timpaddle and Monzyy  for supporting me during this Jam.
